name: trick or treating (Rocket space)
description:
It's Halloween and the monsters are on the loose! They decided to compete to see who gets the most candy, choose a monster and compete against other monsters.
 ~~~ CONTROLS ~~~
Arrows: Move 
Z: Attack
X: special 
~~~ HOW TO PLAY ~~~
 Catch more candy than enemy monsters before time runs out, dodge enemies and collect souls to recover HP.
